scripts.postbuild:opennext: sed -i 's/process\.chdir("");/\/\/ process.chdir(""); \/\/ Disabled for Cloudflare Workers/' .open-next/server-functions/default/handler.mjs 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.preview: opennextjs-cloudflare build && npm run postbuild:opennext && opennextjs-cloudflare preview
scripts.deploy: opennextjs-cloudflare build && npm run postbuild:opennext && opennextjs-cloudflare deploy
